title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw: We have been trying for the last two weeks to get the new version of the subt simulator working \(ignition\).  We have tried on many different machines, and so far, we cannot figure out how to connect to the agents and drive them around in the team.ign file.  Has anyone gotten this working on the new ignition system?  It appears that the effort to get our system ported from the gazebo9 system to the ignition system is going to quite burdensome, but we can’t even start that yet because the simulator doesn’t run for us.
content.html: We have been trying for the last two weeks to get the new version of the subt simulator working (ignition). We have tried on many different machines, and so far, we cannot figure out how to connect to the agents and drive them around in the team.ign file. Has anyone gotten this working on the new ignition system? It appears that the effort to get our system ported from the gazebo9 system to the ignition system is going to quite burdensome, but we can’t even start that yet because the simulator doesn’t run for us.
